app.title: TeslaCam Player
about.title: About TeslaCam Player
about.text: TeslaCam Player is a desktop player and management tool for TeslaCam / Sentry Mode videos, supporting browse, preview and export.
update.check_failed.title: Check for Updates Failed
update.no_new.title: Check for Updates
update.no_new.text:
You are already using the latest version: {current}
Latest release: {latest}
update.has_new.title: New Version Available
update.asset_missing.title: Cannot Download
update.asset_missing.text.os: No installer matching current OS was found. Please download manually from GitHub Releases.
update.asset_missing.text.url: Download URL is missing in release assets. Please download manually from GitHub Releases.
download.title: Downloading Update
download.label: Downloading installer, please wait...
download.copy.ok: Download URL has been copied to clipboard.
download.failed.title: Download Failed
download.install_failed.title: Failed to Start Installer
proxy.title: Proxy Settings
proxy.label: Proxy URL:
proxy.hint: Note: Only used for update download requests. Please use full protocol+host+port, e.g. http://127.0.0.1:7890
proxy.error.empty: Proxy is enabled but URL is empty.
proxy.saved: Proxy settings saved. They will take effect for the next download.
settings.language.saved: Language setting has been saved. Please restart the application to apply it.
